title: Pauline Ferrand-Prévot Abandons La Vuelta Femenina in Blow to Tour de France Preparation
content:
Ferrand-Prévot 'not fit enough to continue' Spanish tour after suffering crucial time-losses on Wednesday's stage.

Read the full article at Pauline Ferrand-Prévot Abandons La Vuelta Femenina in Blow to Tour de France Preparation on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
